name: Michael Mc.Ninja
description:
Made some years ago, one of my first games! (Maybe the first one you could call a game).

Michael Mc.Ninja brought his new, shiny Katana to a bar. But oh no! Happy hour has struck, move arround and be sure to keep the pointy end away from others unless you want to end up in jail.

Controls:

A/D - Move

Left/Right Arrow keys - Look away
